java.lang.Object

All Implemented Interfaces:
Wrapper, CommonDataSource, DataSource
Direct Known Subclasses:
C3P0Datasource, H2InMemoryDataSource, NonConnectionPooledDatasource
public abstract class AbstractDataSource
extends Object
implements DataSource

All DatasourceFactory datasources must extend this class. TODO jjs why?

Method Detail

assertRequiredProperties

protected void assertRequiredProperties()
Called by DatasourcesFactory, purpose of this method is to ensure all required properties have been defined. An UnsupportedOperationException will be thrown if a required property is found to be missing. todo jjs wtf? UnsupportedOperationExeption

setProperties

protected final void setProperties(List<Property> _properties)
Sets the property map based on the list of properties // Order of precedence
  1. Value
  2. System property
  3. Environment property
  4. Encrypted value
    5. todo jjs encrypted value and value should be both 1 and mutually exclusive, but this is the kind of stuff you have to deal with with maps is there an indirection from the property name to the environment name or is this an ill considered refactor artifact

    Parameters:
    _properties -
